outline:
1. to save, be saved, be delivered
    1. (Niphal)
      1. to be liberated, be saved, be delivered
      2. to be saved (in battle), be victorious
    2. (Hiphil)
      1. to save, deliver
      2. to save from moral troubles
      3. to give victory to
kjv_def: [idiom] at all, avenging, defend, deliver(-er), help, preserve, rescue, be safe, bring (having) salvation, save(-iour), get victory.
strongs_def: properly, to be open, wide or free, i.e. (by implication) to be safe; causatively, to free or succor
